summary: Create an animation of a colourful table lamp that switches on/off when a button is pressed.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page UI that displays a colourful table lamp illustration and a control button that toggles the lamp between ON and OFF states when pressed.

Implement a smooth on/off animation for the lamp: when turning ON, the lamp should visibly “light up” (e.g., glow, brighter shade, light cone); when turning OFF, the glow/light should fade out smoothly.
Make the lamp “colourful” by incorporating multiple vivid colours into the lamp design and/or light effect, and ensure the colour styling remains coherent in both ON and OFF states.

Add user-facing English text labels for the control (e.g., button label changes between “Switch On” and “Switch Off”, or shows current state “Lamp is On/Off”) and ensure basic accessibility (keyboard activation and ARIA where appropriate).
Apply a consistent visual theme for the page (layout, typography, and colours) that complements a colourful lamp animation; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette unless necessary.

new_feature_requests.summary: Animated colourful table lamp that toggles on/off via button press

projectName: Colourful table lamp on/off animation controlled by a button
